import React from 'react'; import { X } from 'lucide-react'; const SIPModal = ({ isOpen, onClose, fund }) => { if (!isOpen) return null; return (

Register SIP

Fund: {fund?.schemeName}

Scheme Code: {fund?.schemeCode}

SIP Registration
This feature is coming soon!
You'll be able to set up systematic investment plans for this fund.
); }; export default SIPModal;
